description: Erection of a front and rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height by 300mm; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the first floor rear extension; erection of a side and rear infill extension at first floor level on top of the two storey back addition, including raising the height of parapet wall with adjoining property at no. 46, and installation of a flat green roof on top of the side extension; erection of a two storey rear extension at lower and upper ground floor level, following the demolition of external rear structure, infilling to the rear elevation, and removal of existing stairs to the rear elevation; alterations to the existing terrace area in the front garden, in connection with the erection of a planting area; erection of replacement metal railings to the existing front boundary wall; formation of a roof terrace to the rear elevation at second floor level on top of the remaining flat roof of first floor back addition, enclosed in 1.1m high guarding and 1.7m high obscure glazed following the removal of existing railings, to the rear and both side elevations.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
